title: Greta Van Susteren - Wikipedia
snippet: Greta Conway Van Susteren (born June 11, 1954) is an American journalist, lawyer, and television news anchor for Newsmax TV. She was previously on CNN, Fox News, and MSNBC. She hosted Fox News's On the Record w/ Greta Van Susteren for 14 years (2002–2016) before departing for MSNBC, where ...

title: Greta Van Susteren Will Join Newsmax Early-Evening Lineup in June
snippet: Greta Van Susteren will join conservative news outlet Newsmax as an early evening anchor in June.

title: Greta Van Susteren: MSNBC Only Network That Ever Tried to Control My Show | Barrett Media
snippet: (Photo: Greta Van Susteren) Television · "That’s why I got fired at MSNBC. Because they said I needed to play ball, and I thought that didn’t work." By: BNM Staff · Date: March 21, 2025 · - Advertisement - Greta Van Susteren has had a long career in cable news across a variety of networks.

title: Greta Van Susteren facts for kids
snippet: Greta Conway Van Susteren, born on June 11, 1954, is an American journalist and television news anchor. She is also a lawyer.
